name: Blockworks Daily
title: Checking In On Depin
text:
Synopsis
DePIN (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks) represents a promising but currently overlooked crypto sector that offers real-world utility and potential for breaking crypto's self-referential attention economy.

Key Insights
- Several DePIN projects are generating actual revenue in 2024, including:
  - Hivemapper: Selling mapping data
  - Akash: Facilitating GPU rentals (primarily for AI model training)
  - Render Network: Providing GPUs to artists
  - GeodNet: Offering high-precision location data

- Current challenges for DePIN include:
  - Low attention from crypto investors
  - Small absolute revenue numbers
  - Token price pressure from emissions used to incentivize network participants
  - Slow organic demand growth

- Potential future DePIN developments include:
  - Cheaper WiFi
  - Virtual power plants
  - Censorship-resistant internet infrastructure

- The sector represents a potential breakthrough for crypto, offering tangible services outside the typical crypto trading ecosystem
